battle_gml_Object_obj_battle_kf_Draw_73_: Do you have any idea what it was like?
What it was like... to be abandoned?
Wandering the dark, scared, confused...
Left with questions after questions...
"Why would they abandon me} Did I do something wrong?"
"Am I... not good enough?"
We were best friends@ You always looked up to me.
So tell me why{ Don't you at least owe me that?
Can you even answer me, Kris?
Or... are you still trying to leave me in the dark?
I did EVERYTHING I could@ Everything I was supposed to.
I worked tirelessly to be perfect, for YOU.
I wanted to be the one who could lift you out of your dark place...
Someone who motivated you to keep persevering!
Funny how that works, huh?
I try to pull you out of the shadows, and you toss me into them?
Well, I found a home there.
A home with people who won't put a knife in my back!
When you came back, all I could think about was finding you.
Revenge was part of it, but that only goes so far.
Really, I've just been dying to know where I went wrong.
But if you can't, or won't give me answers...
Then there's no point in trying anymore.
Goodbye, Kris.
battle_gml_Object_obj_battle_sio_Draw_73: It's unfortunate things had to end this way, but we'll persevere.
We've rebooted the show before, we can do it again.
(bzzt) Hey hey hey ladies, gentlemen, and unidentifiable creatures! (bzzt)
(bzzt) Your host's craving VIOLENCE. (bzzt)
Luckily, this isn't the end for Lightners on this program.
We still have two more to work with.
There's no way in hell they'd listen to you!
There's... (cough) no way in hell they'd listen to you!
Toriel, maybe... but the ghost} Impressionable, easy to manipulate...
All the hallmarks of a good TV star!
Do you think Mike will just allow this?
My brother's sentimental, but he'll understand eventually.
Understand what} Keeping Lightners trapped here forever?!
Uh... yes?
Before you ask... yes. We will keep Lightners trapped here.
You kids think I'm the bad guy, but I'm not.
Everything I've done is for a good reason.
Bribing my enemies, forcing staff to work on holidays...
It was all for the prosperity of this world!
My people need a guiding light.
And when you have failed us again and again...
That light has to come from somewhere else.
The burden of putting smiles on their faces is mine to bear.
If sacrifices have to be made, so be it.
The crew was right...
You're just as much of a criminal as the rest of them!
You're just as much of a criminal as the rest of them! (COUGH)
Incorrect. Nothing I do is a crime.
(bzzt) True! She's legally exempt from any wrongdoing! (bzzt)
It'll take a lot of work to get things back on track.
I've tolerated those shadowy hoodlums for too long...
And you ran around MY city putting false ideas in people's heads.
So much chaos thrown at my feet...
It's going to take a lot of coffee for me to organize it all.
All things considered, I'm optimistic about the future.
Your hostile and unruly behavior is just a setback.
A very exhausting setback.
A few reruns and commercial breaks should do it.
People will trust anything they see on TV, especially if it comes from Mike.
With his voice and my watchful eyes, everything will be okay.
The Broadcast World will become a vibrant paradise once more!
You can't be serious.
I guess you could say it'll be...
MIKE, HOW DO I ACTIVATE HARD MODE ON THIS THING!?
Tenna-Tastic!
(bzzt) I never completed "HARD MODE", sis. (bzzt)
(bzzt) That joke was terrible, sis. (bzzt)
(bzzt) I didn't think they'd be able to dodge all the
(bzzt) Did you pay attention at all when I
Enough about my grand plans to clean up your mess, though.
You're kind of eating up all the time I designated for thrashing you...
So, like, please get beaten up?
battle_gml_Object_obj_battle_sof_Draw_73: I've heard the signals from outsidesidesidesideside
All those sad calls, wishing things were different...
I understand your hesitation, but why leave me on hold like thisthisthisthisthisthis?
You know what we're missing out on, dancing on these loathsome strings.
Hahaha{ What adorable, foolish puppets we all make!
If I can't persuade you to stand down...
Perhaps you'll listen to a familiar face?
Tell memememememe
After overcoming mad clowns and filthy swindlers, do you really want to stop chasing that signal?
Living unsatisfied, letting sweet nothings be whispered in your ear?
I know it can be hard to hear all this, but don't feel down!
When I felt sad, I liked to play my favorite songsongsongsongsongsong
Look at how much BRIGHTER life becomes{ Take a slice...
In a world that leaves us in silence, I'll stand by you!
None of us have to be alone anymore!
You don't have to be a fool, staring at a fraudulent sky...
WATCHING YOUR BROKEN MIND MANIFEST AS A #$%!ING CATCATCATCATCATCAT
My oh my, aren't you popular these days, Kris!
So many incoming callers with things to tell youyouyouyouyouyou!
You know, I always thought I had a lot to say...
But when I heard the call, I realized my words were nothing but garbage.
I'll tell you what, speaking garbage isn't half as fun as lying around like it.
Thinking about it makes my entire body buzz with disgust!
Cities rise and fall, people enter and exit the stagestagestagestagestage
...But nothing will ever change.
Nothing will ever matter... unless...
Unless... we
Um, one second...
They called the wrong number.
... Nothing will ever matter unless we turn our ears to heaven.
HAHAHA!
LOOK AT WHAT I HAVE ACCOMPLISHED IN JUST ONE DAYDAYDAYDAYDAYDAY
NO ONE CAN BRING ME DOWN FROM THIS HIGH@ NOBODY CAN.
IT'S DRAWING EVER CLOSER... CAN YOU HEAR IT?
THIS IS MY SIGNAL OF FREEDOM!
THE EX-STATIC RESONANCE IS UPON US!!
battle_gml_Object_obj_falsefountain_text: Ralsei's right, we have come a long way.
I wonder how many more times we'll have to do this...
It feels like every adventure gets bigger and bigger.
I wonder... if it'll become too much for the three of us to handle?
(It was as if your very SOUL was glowing...)
